definitions.define:
You have decided to post a gift voucher worth %s to %s who\'s email address is %s

The text accompanying the email will read

Dear %s

You have been sent a Gift Voucher worth %s by %s
Congratulations, your Gift Voucher has successfully been sent
For more information regarding Gift Certificates, please see our F.A.Q.
The Gift Certificate number may be invalid or has already been redeemed. To contact the shop owner please use the Contact Page
Congratulations, you have redeemed a Gift Certificate worth %s
